long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the grace of Shinobu Kocho with a serene purple theme, featuring her iconic butterfly hairpin!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A calming interface inspired by Shinobu, featuring soft purple hues and delicate butterfly accents.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with an elegant display, reflecting Shinobu’s composed and peaceful nature.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Enjoy Demon Slayer-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as graceful and calming as Shinobu herself.
